Dataset.Data: select A.InfoID, A.RecvType as Flag, B.UserID as RecvID, '(' || B.UserCode || ')' || B.UserName as RecvName from Sys_Info_Send_User A , Sys_User B where A.RecvType = '1' and A.InfoID = #InfoID# and A.ObjID = B.UserID union all select A.InfoID, A.RecvType as Flag, B.GroupID as RecvID, '(' || B.GroupCode || ')' || B.GroupName as RecvName from Sys_Info_Send_User A , Sys_Group B where A.RecvType = '2' and A.InfoID = #InfoID# and A.ObjID = B.GroupID union all select A.InfoID, A.RecvType as Flag, B.BranID as RecvID, '(' || B.BranCode || ')' || B.BranName as RecvName from Sys_Info_Send_User A , Sys_Bran B where A.RecvType = '3' and A.InfoID = #InfoID# and A.ObjID = B.BranID

select A.InfoID, C.BranID, A.InfoDate, A.Title, A.Note, A.Priority, A.IsSend, A.SendDate, '(' || C.BranCode || ')' || C.BranName as SendBran from Sys_Info_Send A, Sys_Bran C, Sys_User B
A.IsSend = '0' and A.UserID = B.UserID and A.UserID = #UserID# and B.BranID = C.BranID and (A.InfoDate between #BDate# and #EDate#)
A.Note like #Note#
A.Title like #Title#
A.InfoDate desc

A.#Title#
A.#Priority#
